feed.title: Pietroglyph
feed.subtitle: A personal blog with some tech stuff and some personal bloggy stuff. It's pretty cool.

entry.title: MEMEPAINT
entry.content:
So awhile back I got a bit bored in a class and decided to quickly play around with the HTML5 canvas and make somthing with it. I thought “Hey, why not put a bunch of stale memes on the canvas?” Eventually I used to project to play around with Firebase and that gave birth to a multiplayer version called MEMEPAINT With Friends.

Internals

MEMEPAINT is writen in the stuff that runs in your browser, namley HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. It’s pretty simple and I was working on it back when my programming skills were slightly less developed.
entry.summary: So awhile back I got a bit bored in a class and decided to quickly play around with the HTML5 canvas and make somthing with it. I thought “Hey, why not put a bunch of stale memes on the canvas?” Eventually I used to project to play around with Firebase and that gave birth to a multiplayer version called MEMEPAINT With Friends.

entry.title: An Introduction
entry.content:
So… I decided that it would be interesting to create a Jekyll blog that could hold links to my projects, and other things like that along with other thoughts and bloggy things. This is being hosted on GitHub Pages, and so far it seems to work pretty well.

Thats pretty much it.
